TestItem.Stem: Which of the following best describes the relation of paragraph 2 to paragraph 1?

Distractor_list.Distractor: Paragraph 2 introduces new research findings that challenge the conclusion presented in paragraph 1.
Paragraph 2 presents common situations that the conclusion presented in paragraph 1 cannot account for.
Paragraph 2 provides the evidence on which the conclusion presented in paragraph 1 was based.
Paragraph 2 explains why our experiences of personality do not seem to support the conclusion presented in paragraph 1.
